tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited the clinic having pain in my lower teeth, dr shankadeep saha was such  a calm and friendly doctor who explained me the reason for pain and he gave the solution too, root canal was done on my teeth. 
It was a pleasant experience with less or no pain at all after the injection ; was done in a day too.. And no pain thereafter... Thanks dr... U have a good skill of managing patients and would surely recommend him for dental related problems to all my friends. Thank u doctor.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had come for teeth treatment. Had permanent stains due to fluorosis on my front tooth which I wanted to get removed . Doctor explained the option and we went ahead with veneers.  Appointments were scheduled as per convenience and visits went very well. Really happy with outcome of the treatment now that the stains are not visible at all. The color perfectly matches my liking.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback.

review:
I got my dental makeover done by dr. Saha.
He is as friendly a doctor can be, all the appointments were time coordinated and scheduled by practo. To my satisfaction he did a round of cleaning, a couple of root canal treatments, followed by placement of a 3 artificial tooth which looks completely natural.
I would highly recommend the doctor for any and all kinds of tooth related issues.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback.

review: Doctor Shankhadeep Saha was really nice because of his professionalism,he explained everything about the  treatment before doing it.even he was very polite &friendly. The cost is also very less & it was affordable for me who went there from a  middle class family. The materials he used was from good brands & gave 10 years of warranty also warranty card.the treatment period was really comfortable .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I started seeing Dr. Saha the last 2 months of 2018 and on short notice he was able to be a MIRACLE WORKER! I haven't been to the dentist in YEARS and he was not only transparent discussing what needed to be done to my mouth, he also went ABOVE AND BEYOND for me! Removed a massive tooth growing in the wrong direction which could've been bad for me in the long run. He also did my fillings but went above and beyond ONCE AGAIN and hooked me up white fillings instead of all that silver ruining my mouth! WHAT A GUY!! Highly recommend him and his staff! Incredible energy and a great atmosphere!!
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback.
